page.title: 11ABBEY SCHOOL,FORT AUGUSTUS(2
page.content: The{Save the Abbey School Action {Committee }wrote to all the former pupils and parents of present pupils explaining the position and asking for aid.They also advertised in the nationat press and appealed through radio and television. Happily financial aid and the promise of additional pupils was forecoming and it was decided that the school would not close. Local people who are employed at the Abbey are hoping that the improvement will continue and that they will not have to endure a similar experience in future years. The school is part of a {Benedictine {Abbey}which stands on the site of a Government fort built at the time of the{Jacobite Uprisings }in the early eighteenth century.
